H0.text: What was the name of the cat in Rising Damp. Whiskers

H1.text: What was the name of the cat in Rising Damp. Felix

H2.text: What was the name of the cat in Rising Damp. Mittens

H3.text: What was the name of the cat in Rising Damp. Wien

A4.text: Rigsby's amiable pet, and confidant, is so named because, as Rigsby tells it, when he goes to put him out on a cold dark night, 'if there is another set of eyes out there, then it's Good Night, Vienna'
